title.rendered: Project Update: Concept for monitoring and understanding component use on production systems

content.rendered:
Development has continued!

Due to new circumstances in my life I have been able to dedicate more time to this project and others. It has a splash page, documentation and the GitHub is public as usual so please feel free to take a look. I have settled on laraval and nextJS for the stack and I’m hoping to make some real progress. This is also a learning project for me as my real first foray into laravel.
